page.title: 15STANDARD OF LIVING
page.content: Our group decided to find out how high the standard of living is in our village of Eagle.We wrote a list out and we put down costly items which people might own.We each went round a classroom.We asked each child what they had got in their homes. Of the 50 families inthe school 66% had 1 car and 36% had 2 or more cars.Videos were found in 68% of the houses.Only 36% of the families had 1 colour T.V.but 56% of the people had 2 or more colour T.V's.Hi-fi units were found in 82% of the houses.Three families had 2 Hi-Fi units. Of the families which were in the school 86% had a telephone in their homes.Deep freezers were owned by 24% of the families.We wonder what people will have in their homes in a hundred years time.
